commit message:
Started implementing filtering

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

- Added UI to make filters
- use Title and not Name for filtering
- Keep unquoted pattern string in SubredditFilter
-

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

Fixed conflicts in ThreadsListActivity

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

Slight code cleanup

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

- Edit Filter layout: Make text fields single line
- Filter list: Large text

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

Removed dependence on editor.putStringSet/getStringSet

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>

- Avoid GridLayout for legacy support
- Add help text to FilterListActivity
- Renamed FilterConfigActivity to FilterListActivity
- Use StringUtils.isEmpty() instead of s.isEmpty() for legacy support
- Set inputTypes for the EditTexts

Signed-off-by: Tord Øygard <tord@oygard.org>
Cleaned up filter list activity for user friendliness
Moved filter editing from the subreddit activity's menu to a preference
Made filter matching (for both title and subreddit) case insensitive
Added confirmation dialog when clearing all filters
Bumped version info; credited tordo for his new work
